author: bayard
msg: Implementing an option to UnicodeUnescaper in which the syntax '\u+0047' is supported. By default it remains unsupported to match Java's method of parsing. Request in LANG-507

author: rfeng
msg: Refactor the OSGi remote services implementation and improve the notifications

author: rfeng
msg: Change some extension code to be declarative instead of being registered using module activators
